product_name: The North Face Cape River Full-Zip Hoodie - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Pull on the casual Cape River Full-Zip hoodie from The North Face when you're hanging at home working on your bike or going for a light morning hike on the local trails. Soft blend of cotton, polyester and modal will make the Cape River hoodie an instant favorite. Full-zip front; two hand pockets; ribbing at the cuffs and waistband. Closeout.
short_description: Pull on the casual Cape River Full-Zip hoodie from The North Face when you're hanging at home working on your bike or going for a light morning hike on the local trails.
